name: SteelSeries Arctis 1 - Headset - full size - 2.4 GHz - wireless | Dell USA
description: The Arctis 1 is an all-platform gaming headset that doubles as your on-the-go headphones. With the same high-quality speaker drivers, a detachable microphone, and sleek low-profile design, the Arctis 1 is made for all platforms.
